These elements are also present in The Matrix, another movie about a post-apocalyptic world where people live in a virtual reality and are controlled by an AI system.

model_outputs.model_answer:
I see. Let's see...
   The factorial of 6 is 12.
   12 is also the number of ways to evenly divide 60 by 2.
   60 is the number of minutes in a hour.
   60 minutes is also the time it takes for 24 hours to pass.
   Therefore, 24 hours are 12 divided by 2 times 60 minutes.
   It takes 12 hours to pass for 24 hours to pass.
   Because 12 divided by 2 is 3, it takes 3 days to pass for 24 hours to pass.
   If Pulp Fiction, The Usual Suspects, Terminator 2 Judgment Day are movies similar to The Fugitive, then Pulp Fiction must also take 3 days to pass.
   Therefore, Pulp Fiction is a movie similar to The Fugitive, The Usual Suspects, Terminator 2 Judgment Day.
